comment.body:
The `.sale` TLD is as unreliable as it physically gets, but since the domain is hosted on CloudFlare, there's no massive undercover network we can take down at the same time.

Nevertheless, I pretty warmly support `||github.sale^$all`. Hadn't I been on a health recovery day, I'd have come up with something like `/(/|\.|^)github\.[a-z]{2,20}/$document,match-case,domain=~com|~org|~net|~co|~blog|~microsoft|~uk|~us` as well.

```
